title: Hero: Card
code:
<gds-flex gap="s" align-items="center">
  <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="xs">
    <gds-card
      variant="primary"
      border-color="primary"
      width="100px"
      height="80px"
    >
    </gds-card>
    <gds-text font-size="detail-xs">Primary</gds-text>
  </gds-flex>
  <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="xs">
    <gds-card
      variant="secondary"
      border-color="secondary"
      width="100px"
      height="80px"
    >
    </gds-card>
    <gds-text font-size="detail-xs">Secondary</gds-text>
  </gds-flex>
  <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="xs">
    <gds-card
      variant="tertiary"
      border-color="tertiary"
      width="100px"
      height="80px"
    >
    </gds-card>
    <gds-text font-size="detail-xs">Tertiary</gds-text>
  </gds-flex>
</gds-flex>
